RelatedSentence: BERKELEY ( CBS SF ) - The body of a man found near Grizzly Peak on University of California at Berkeley campus Sunday afternoon has been identified by the Alameda County coroner 's bureau as 22 - year - old Concord resident Lorenzo Baltazar - Trujillo .
At about 2:20 p.m. Sunday , a female hiker found Baltazar - Trujillo 's body at the base of a 100 - foot cliff near a popular hiking spot , UC Berkeley police said .
